payload.content: Demis Hassabis, Dario Amodei, and Zanny Minton Beddoes participated in a discussion at the World Economic Forum 2026 titled “The Day After AGI.”

content: Demis Hassabis, Dario Amodei, and Zanny Minton Beddoes participated in a discussion at the World Economic Forum 2026 titled “The Day After AGI.”

payload.content: The discussion at the World Economic Forum 2026, "The Day After AGI," covered the future of artificial general intelligence, its governance, societal impact, and risk landscape.
